entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 27 April 2023
